message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a great price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8250. This is a great compromise that still reflects the product's value and my minimum acceptable price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $7000, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm not sure if I can go any lower than this, so I'm hoping we can come to an agreement here.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not comfortable going down to $7000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $7500, which is still a good compromise considering the product's value. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm afraid $7500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a firm offer of $7000, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm not comfortable going any higher than this, so I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
